itemDescription: Scottish former professional association football player born 1946

wikipedia_page.main: James Shaw Thomson (born 1 October 1946) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a defender for Chelsea from 1965 to 1968 before subsequently moving to Burnley until retiring in 1981.

response: * Jim Thomson (footballer, born 1946), Scottish footballer who played for Burnley
* Jim Thomson (footballer, born 1971), Scottish footballer who played for Arbroath, Clyde, Stenhousemuir and Queen of the South where he was Captain
* Jim Thomson (ice hockey, born 1965), Canadian ice hockey player
